name: Blood Thorns
description:
I'm sure you are hoping to rescue the sleepy princess. Well, the easy part is to kiss her. But first, you have to reach this damned tower... You may have to pay the toll with your blood...

Inextricable wall of bloody brambles for Mörk Borg.

Good luck to escape.

Not a native speaker, feel free to point out any typo.
